ygData.subject: Re: Yet more on PoA bard quests plus a rant
ygData.msgSnippet: Heh maybe except you seem to forget there are less zones to hunt. And why do you think your running into 50 druids in your zone? Maybe because it s not near as
ygData.messageBody:
Heh maybe except you seem to forget there are less zones to hunt. And why do
you think your running into 50 druids in your zone? Maybe because it's not
near as crowded? On E'ci even during prime time there are maybe 30 peopole
there 40 tops. You know what we played with 80-90 people there so don't tell
me it's overcrowded.

Naeeldar

-----Original Message-----
From: Gwyn Carnegie <gcarnegi@...>
To: eqbards@onelist.com <eqbards@onelist.com>
Date: Tuesday, January 25, 2000 5:16 AM
Subject: [eqbards] Yet more on PoA bard quests plus a rant


>From: Gwyn Carnegie <gcarnegi@...>
>
>> From: "Naeeldar" <jackal@...>
>> Hell you forgot some dungeons like Sol A which is baren.
>> Or mm same thing. Fact of the matter is your argument is
>> off somewhat because there are zones at your level exmpty
>> while at mine their aren't any that are even low.
>
>Nope, I didn't forget Sol A but it's mostly all camped (King, Bartender,
>Predator, Foreman, Clockworks, Singe, Kindle and the zone entrance).
>
>Unrest basement always has one if not 3 groups in it during prime time
>with the knight camped, the hand room camped, the barkeep camped and
>even the rooms on the first and second floor with single spawns in them
>are camped.
>
>Permafrost will have one group working the elite spawns and pulling the
>diplomat. I always see at least 1 group in the preacher area; sometimes
>2 as the second group will camp the archaeologist. Lvl 50 druids take up
>a permanent residence in the King spawn area and the Alchemist is
>getting to be camped 24/7 as well.
>
>MM is starting to become packed as well with 3 groups working the
>ent/lake area, 2 in the GY, 1 in secret room, 2 working the gargs in the
>torture chamber area, 1 working ancil valley, 1 working the castle
>foyer, and a group way in back doing the maid/butler spawns. I'd call
>that pretty damn camped for the 20-40 spawns.
>
>In CT, the TR, achron (2 or 3 groups in the temple), and green pool is
>defiantly camped. The planks area is getting crowded lately too. During
>prime time, a second group will clean the foyer portion of TR while
>being on the waiting list. Always at least 2 or more groups pulling maze
>into the courtyard. The only spawn that I'm not sure is being worked
>aggressively on my server if the Avatar himself.
>
>Upper Guk seems to be less packed but then, the lord and the croc areas
>are camped 24/7 with the scyer having a waiting list. The warden, the
>squire... even the darn spiders are all camped during prime time. You
>betcha
>
>Sure I've left out some zones but I think I've made my point. It's not
>just crowding at the +45 level; it's spread out all over now. I don't
>think any one particular lvl group can feel victimized here. We are all
>suffering.
>
>--
>Kitsune Daiskoshi, Ranger of 33 seasons
>Chortles Pyka, Bard of 21 seasons
>Melancholy Diverted, Quellious Server
>-----------------------------------------------------------------------
>Gwyn Carnegie, Systems Analyst gcarnegi@...
